timeline.message: Fix multiple versions module test case
Enable single bal file test cases

timeline.bodyText:
We can get rid of asserting whether file exists because Files.isDirectory(modulePath) will fail anyway if the file doesn't exist. WDYT?
Let's correct this in other similar places too.
timeline.author: Dilhasha
